# This is dhgs-tool it is a multi-tool was no specific use!
The current features we have include DDOS and Password Hash in MD5 and Git clone automated kind of, AUR is it's more better because it's more simpler, Github requires username and a repository name which can be very annoying.

Now some fun features I plan on adding or already added,
Username/Welcomer System already been added and it's quite nice I just had a little nice touch to it I guess.

I might be adding some Easter eggs I think it would be really cool to have some but I don't know what they're going to do exactly yet

the license for this program is GNU General Public License v3.0

[![License: GPL v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPLv3-blue.svg)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0)


# The important stuff
an important stuff to note is some things may be broken not everything is in fully Rewritten or worked yet, Things like DDOS still have the previous issues but critical issue that he's fixing just tell me
